pageContext.claim: “We are a big tent and we are a big party of big ideas for the future and that's why African-Americans are joining the Republican Party like nobody ever thought even possible.”
pageContext.analysis: A whopper. Hillary Clinton got 89 percent of the black vote in 2016, compared with a relatively minuscule 8 percent for Trump. A Washington Post-Ipsos poll released Jan. 17 found: "More than 8 in 10 black Americans say they believe Trump is a racist and that he has made racism a bigger problem in the country. Nine in 10 disapprove of his job performance overall."
